name: Whistledart Wings
description: Ifa's outfit. You've never seen Ifa change his hat, but he has done so many times — just, you know, to an identical-looking one on each occasion. "Don't forget to tie a string on a hat you're fixin' to wear, bro. Never know when the wind might nick it — or a pesky saurian, for that matter." So Ifa says with a sigh of exasperation each time the subject is broached.
